title: Phase one: Prince Charles Mountains
creator_credit: Frank Bagnall, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Roger Hayne
brief_description: Shows the work of a topographical and geological survey of the Prince Charles Mountains, Antarctica in 1969. Under summer conditions the land forms are visible, and valuable data is collected and evaluated.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Bagnall, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Roger Hayne
